title: তারিণীখুড়ো ও ঐন্দ্রজালিক (Tarini Khuro O Oindrojalik)
synopsis: In this collection, Tarini Khuro shares more of his thrilling adventures, blending mystery, magic, and supernatural elements. Stories like these showcase Ray's skill in creating gripping narratives that keep readers engaged till the very end.

title: নরিস সাহেবের বাংলো (Norris Saheber Banglo)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro narrates a chilling tale about a deserted bungalow once owned by a British officer, Norris Saheb. Strange happenings and eerie noises from the bungalow raise questions about its haunted past, as Tarini Khuro uncovers the truth with his characteristic wit and suspense.

title: গণৎকার তারিণীখুড়ো (Gonotkar Tarini Khuro)
synopsis: In this collection, Tarini Khuro shares stories involving fortune-tellers, predictions, and uncanny coincidences. One such tale revolves around a mysterious astrologer whose predictions seem alarmingly accurate, leading to a suspenseful unraveling of hidden truths.

title: গল্পবলিয়ে তারিণীখুড়ো (Golpoboliye Tarini Khuro)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro, the master storyteller, presents a fresh set of his intriguing adventures. The stories blend humor, adventure, and suspense as Tarini Khuro recounts encounters with strange characters and bizarre incidents that keep his young listeners spellbound.

title: ডুমনিগড়ের মানুষখেকো (Dumnigarh-er Manushkheko)
synopsis: This spine-chilling story revolves around a man-eating predator that haunts the forests of Dumnigarh. Tarini Khuro’s narration builds a gripping atmosphere of danger and suspense as he reveals his own encounter with the ferocious beast.

title: কনওয়ে কাস্‌লের প্রেতাত্মা (Conway Castle-er Pretatma)
synopsis: In this supernatural tale, Tarini Khuro recounts his eerie experience at the haunted Conway Castle. Strange apparitions and unexplained events in the ancient castle make for a thrilling ghost story with an unexpected twist.

title: শেঠ গঙ্গারামের ধনদৌলত (Seth Gangaramer Dhonodoulot)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro tells the story of Seth Gangaram, a wealthy but eccentric man whose hidden fortune becomes the center of a dangerous treasure hunt. The tale is filled with mystery, clever schemes, and the thrill of uncovering long-buried secrets.

title: লখ্‌নৌর ডুয়েল (Lucknour Duel)
synopsis: Set against the backdrop of old Lucknow, this story revolves around a tense duel between two men of pride and honor. Tarini Khuro’s narration brings alive the rich atmosphere and the dramatic build-up to the final showdown.

title: ধুমলগড়ের হান্টিং লজ (Dhumolgorer Hunting Lodge)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro shares his mysterious adventure at the hunting lodge in Dhumalgarh. Strange occurrences during a hunting trip raise suspicions of something supernatural lurking in the shadows, building a suspenseful and eerie narrative.

title: খেলোয়াড় তারিণীখুড়ো (Kheloyar Tarini Khuro)
synopsis: In this collection, Tarini Khuro recalls thrilling stories where games, competitions, and unexpected challenges take center stage. Whether it's cards, chess, or high-stakes wagers, each tale is filled with wit, suspense, and clever twists.

title: টলিউডে তারিণীখুড়ো (Tollywood-e Tarini Khuro)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro ventures into the glamorous yet mysterious world of Tollywood. Behind the scenes of film sets and stardom, he uncovers hidden secrets, scandals, and intriguing incidents that showcase the darker side of the film industry.

title: তারিণীখুড়ো ও বেতাল (Tarini Khuro O Betal)
synopsis: In this eerie tale, Tarini Khuro recounts a bizarre encounter involving a vetal — a ghostly entity from folklore. The story blends supernatural elements with psychological tension, keeping readers engrossed till the very end.

title: মহিম সান্যালের ঘটনা (Mohim Sanyaler Ghotona)
synopsis: Tarini Khuro narrates the unusual case of Mahim Sanyal, a man who becomes entangled in a web of strange coincidences and unexpected dangers. The story unfolds with gripping suspense, characteristic of Ray's masterful storytelling.

title: জুটি (Juti)
synopsis: In this unique story, Tarini Khuro tells about an extraordinary pair whose unusual partnership leads to a series of curious and suspenseful events. The tale offers Ray’s trademark blend of humor, human psychology, and unexpected outcomes.
